data.quote: The world is cruel, but also very beautiful
data.author: Mikasa Ackerman

data.quote:
Fear is not evil. It tells you what weakness is. 
 And once you know your weakness, you can become stronger 
 as well as kinder
data.author: Gildarts Clive ~

data.quote:
Sometimes I do feel like I’m a failure. 
 Like there’s no hope for me. 
 But even so, I’m not gonna give up. Ever!
data.author: Izuku Midoriya

data.quote:
Living has it own challenges. 
 I’ll give you just one piece of advice. 
 Don’t quit. Yes, when you die, you die. 
 But if you give up, you’re definitely going to die. 
 That, I am sure of.
data.author: Brittany

data.quote: There’s no such thing as talent without hard work
data.author: Shinichi Chiaki

data.quote: Smile . Even If you’re facing an enemy, people can’t attack others with a smile.
data.author: Rurumu

data.quote:
It may be hard right now, but you must silence those thoughts. 
 Stop counting only those things that you have lost. 
 What is gone, is gone.
data.author: Jinbei

data.quote:
Life isn’t about counting all the things you’ve lost, 
 it’s about increasing the number of important things in it.
data.author: Tsukamoto Tsukushi

data.quote:
Whatever you lose, you’ll find it again, 
 but what you throw away you’ll never get it back.
data.author: Kenshin Himura

data.quote:
Remember this… no matter where you go, 
the strength of your mind  and spirit is the most powerful magic of all.
data.author: Princess Emeraude

data.quote: What’s important is not what’s right, but what we believe is right.
data.author: Escha Mailer

data.quote:
Maybe there’s only a dark road up ahead. 
 But you still have to believe and keep going. 
 Believe that the stars will light your path, even a little bit. 
 Come on, let’s go on a journey
data.author: Kaori Miyazono

data.quote:
Knowing you’re different is only the beginning. 
 If you accept these differences, you’ll be able to get past them and grow even closer.
data.author: Miss Kobayashi

data.quote:
In this world, there’s no such thing as 'failure' in the first place. 
 The one who knows the 'ways to win' more than anyone is also the one who’s experienced the most 'mistakes'. 
 In other words… You could say 'failure' is equal to 'success'… Couldn’t you
data.author: Tell 'em, Toriko!

data.quote:
Although I’m weak and full of flaws, I will never stop moving forward. 
 No matter who I am, no one other than myself will create my own existence. 
 No matter what others may think or feel, I will still move forward as myself
data.author: Oz Vessalius

data.quote:
Life is like a tube of toothpaste. 
  When you’ve used all the toothpaste down to the last squeeze, that’s when you’ve really lived. 
 Live with all your might, and struggle as long as you have life.
data.author: Mion Sonozaki

data.quote: Every journey begins with a single step. We just have to have patience
data.author: Milly Thompson

data.quote: The ticket to the future is always open
data.author: Vash The Stampede

data.quote:
It’s more important to master the cards you’re holding 
 than to complain about the ones your opponent was dealt.
data.author: Grimsley

data.quote: Whatever you do, enjoy it to the fullest. That is the secret of life
data.author: Rider
